Title: Requires nonpublic schools to provide the same services that public schools currently provide to nonpublic schools; repealer
Summary: Enacts the "educational equity and choice act"; requires nonpublic schools to provide the same services that public schools currently provide to nonpublic schools; provides that such costs shall be approved by the commissioner of education and borne by the state; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Rpld §701 sub 8, §752 sub 1, §754 sub 1, §§755 & 712, §3635 sub 1 ¶b, sub 2-a, amd Ed L, generally
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring nonpublic schools to provide the same services that public schools currently provide to nonpublic schools; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
